sources.title: A Successful Failure (1934)
sources.description: Ellery Cushing is full of catchy sayings and old-fashioned wisdom. But all that his family cares about is how much money he makes, and all that his boss at the newspaper sees is that Cushing is getting too old to keep up with his work. So his loyal co-worker Phil decides to see what he can do to help everyone see what his friend has to offer. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/a-successful-failure-1934/

sources.title: Successful Failure
sources.description: You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: Successful Failure (1934) COMEDY
sources.description:
Stars: William Collier Sr., Lucile Gleason, Russell Hopton 
Director: Arthur Lubin

(fyi... upper left corner annoyance disappears @ 6m 30s)

A veteran newsman he is promptly fired after he is nagged into asking for a raise by his wife and kids, but soon becomes a surprise hit as a "secret" radio personality!

sources.title: A Successful Failure (1934) Comedy Full length Movie
sources.description:
Ellery Cushing is full of catchy sayings and old-fashioned wisdom. But all that his family cares about is how much money he makes, and all that his boss at the newspaper sees is that Cushing is getting too old to keep up with his work. So his loyal co-worker Phil decides to see what he can do to help everyone see what his friend has to offer.

Director: Arthur Lubin
Writers: Michael Kane, Marion Orth
Stars: William Collier Sr., Lucile Gleason, Russell Hopton 
Genres: Classics, Comedy
